title: Out of the Blue
writer: Bill O'Brien (book), Robert Sarkies, Graeme Tetley
actors: Karl Urban, Matthew Sunderland, Lois Lawn, Simon Ferry
plot: Based on the Aramoana Massacre that occurred on 13 November and 14 November 1990. Resident David Gray, an unemployed gun collector, went on a rampage in which 13 people were shot dead, before Gray himself was shot by police.
